thread.title: Nike Drapes the Air Max Zero in a Crisp All-White Colorway
thread.title_full: Nike Drapes the Air Max Zero in a Crisp All-White Colorway

author: Marcus Cho
title: Nike Drapes the Air Max Zero in a Crisp All-White Colorway
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
The most popular colorway of classic sneakers tends to be those involving all or large amounts of white , which is why we’re sure Nike’s newest Air Max Zero release will be a winner.
Draped from top to bottom in a clean white, the new colorway offers a the usual tooling of the Air Max Zero in its mesh upper, rubber/Zoom Air midsole as well as its classic sleek shape. One interesting detail to note is the inclusion of a “aged” Nike Air unit on the heel, pre-yellowed for a “retro” feel.
You can now pick up a pair for approximately $145 USD at retailers such as Solekitchen .
